entry.title: WIND WARNING , Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:29 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.7°C

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening then light after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023
